SELECT t.contract_no ,c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.ceo_name ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt FROM company c JOIN contract t ON c.company_code = t.company_code
WHERE final_date < sysdate
ORDER BY t.contract_no

SELECT t.contract_no ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt ,t.month_pay_price ,t.total_pay_price ,t.contract_state ,c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.company_tel ,c.company_business_number ,c.company_type ,c.company_address ,c.company_post ,t.contract_sign ,(SELECT LISTAGG(u.module_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY u.module_name) FROM usemodule u WHERE u.contract_no = t.contract_no) AS module_names ,c.ceo_email FROM contract t JOIN company c ON t.company_code = c.company_code WHERE t.contract_no = #{contractNo}
SELECT module_no ,module_name ,module_price ,module_notice ,module_icon FROM module ORDER BY module_no

SELECT t.contract_no ,c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.ceo_name ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt FROM company c JOIN contract t ON c.company_code = t.company_code
WHERE final_date > sysdate
ORDER BY t.contract_no
SELECT qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_writer ,qna_date ,NVL(qna_company,'없음') as qna_company ,qna_state FROM qna ORDER BY qna_no
SELECT qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_content ,qna_writer ,qna_date ,NVL(qna_company,'없음') as qna_company ,qna_reply ,qna_state FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo}
SELECT module_no ,module_name ,module_price ,module_notice ,module_icon FROM module WHERE module_no = #{moduleNo}
SELECT mod_file_no ,mod_file_name ,mod_file_content ,mod_file_path ,mod_file_turn ,mod_file_type ,mod_no ,mod_file_originalname FROM mod_file WHERE mod_no = #{moduleNo} ORDER BY mod_file_turn
